definition[0]: a book, list, record etc which consists of different pieces of information, songs etc
definition[1]: the process of making a book, list, record etc from different pieces of information, songs etc
definition[2]: the process of collecting information together and writing it into a list, report, book etc
example[2]: The auditor must see that proper accounting practices have been observed in the compilation of the accounts.
example[3]: Everyone recognised the expertise and effort involved in the documentâ€™s compilation.
definition[3]: in the US, when an accountant presents a financial statement without a promise that it meets GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES, but which has been prepared according to the rules set out by the AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS
